about_the_game:
"

Weapons of Legend for 5th Edition



From: Jeff Stevens Games

Enhance your treasure hordes, villains, and shop keeps with unique and fascinating magical weapons!

A Wealth of Weaponry!

Weapons of Legend is a 5E supplement from Jeff C. Stevens
containing 83 magical weapons , including
progression rules for 43 of them , allowing a character to acquire the magic weapon early in their adventuring career and watch it progress in power as they complete tasks, finish quests, or gain experience.

Bonds That Grow with Your World & Characters

Each of the 43 progressing Weapons of Legend includes:
  • Art -- A beautiful color image.
  • A Legend -- Lore to help GMs add the weapon to their campaign.
  • Location -- Where the item was last seen.
  • Encounter Ideas -- To help GMs introduce the weapon to the characters.
  • Progression Rules -- So GMs and characters know how and when the weapon progresses and changes.
  • Scalable Statistics -- Common, Uncommon, Rare, Very Rare, and Legendary variants for most Weapons of Legend.

Plus 40 additional mystical weapons, including magic swords, axes, bows, and more! "
